column5: These were on sale last year and quite a few folks took advantage so thought I'd give a heads up - only until tonight though (sorry about the short notice)  Just picked up the 6' Med/Light aand it looks/feels liek a nice piece.
what are they goin for $? might go pick up a ultra light for crappie.. been putting it off for a long time but if the price is right
$39.99...picked up the 5 1/2 fter for my old man last year for that price.  Great little speckle trout rod.
It might be this one   Shimano Bob Izumi Signature Pro Series Fishing Rod Product #78-1285-2 See more Rods or compare Sale From $39.99 Reg. From $69.99 / Great Buy

Sorry guys, forgot to add the link  http://www.canadiantire.ca/AST/browse/5/SportsRec/Fishing/Rods/PRDOVR~0781285P/Shimano%252BBob%252BIzumi%252BSignature%252BPro%252BSeries%252BFishing%252BRod.jsp?locale=en

A few of the stores I went to last week were already sold out. Some instock have missing plastic on the guides, maybe get it for less then $40. I did find a 6 footer though. Nice lightweight rod, used it for smallies last week. Great fight.  Dirk
